price: Sε Yε’de ͻman biara adansefoͻ ba, na (saa Da no) Yε’de wo (Muhammad) nso ba bedi woi nom ho adanseε a, (saa Da no abͻneεfoͻ no) bεyε dεn?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا جِئۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةِۭ بِشَهِيدٖ وَجِئۡنَا بِكَ عَلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā ji'nā min kulli ummatin bishahīdin waji'nā bika ʿalā hāulāi shahīdan
